Standard Rates

Fixed Rate Plans:

   
Your customer service fee will be $X.95. Your bill will also include Atlanta Gas Light charges and state and local taxes. Rates shown will reflect any valid Promo or Partner Codes entered. More Info

Fixed Rate Plans
With fixed natural gas rate plans, you get a great price that won't change for the length of your contract. The early fixed rate contract cancellation fee applies to fixed rate plans if you choose to terminate your fixed rate before it expires.

Variable Rate Plan:

 
       
Your customer service fee will be $X.95. Your bill will also include Atlanta Gas Light charges and state and local taxes. Rates shown will reflect any valid Promo or Partner Codes entered. More Info

Variable Rate Plan
This introductory rate is for your first month of service and is offered to new customers signing up for our Variable Rate Plan. After your first month, you will continue on the Variable Rate Plan which fluctuates month to month with the natural gas market.

Please select a Rate Plan.
